featured.text: Due to the unstable Republic of the Congo.

definition.zh_def: 剛果，位於非洲中部的國家，分為剛果共和國和剛果民主共和國。
definition.en_def: Congo, a country located in Central Africa, divided into the Republic of the Congo and the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
definition.example: The Congo River is one of the longest rivers in the world.
